events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on 2024-04-30. They provided initial details about the accident and requested to file a claim immediately.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the customer's description mentioning a car crash and vehicle damage sustained.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to assist the customer promptly and guide them through the auto accident claim process.
The claim acknowledgement was sent to the customer, confirming receipt and providing an overview of the next steps in processing their auto accident claim.
Request for accident report, driver's license, vehicle registration, and photos of the damaged car was sent to the customer to support the claim investigation.
Customer promptly submitted all requested documents, including the police accident report and photographs of the vehicle collision damage.
The claims investigation team commenced reviewing all documents and contacting witnesses to verify the details of the reported vehicle collision.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the accident was caused by another vehicle, and the damage assessment was finalized.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on the assessed damages to their vehicle and the policy coverage limits.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement proposal and appreciated the timely communication throughout the process.
The claim was officially approved following customer's acceptance of the settlement terms and confirmation of all paperwork.
The approved settlement amount was disbursed to the customerâ€™s registered bank account, completing the financial part of the claim.
The auto accident claim was formally closed after all payments were issued and the customer confirmed full resolution of their case.
Documentation and records related to the claim were archived securely for future reference and compliance with internal policies.
